Title: Permutations
Description:
A permutation of integers 1,2,\ldots,n is called beautiful if there are no adjacent elements whose difference is 1. 
 Given n, construct a beautiful permutation if such a permutation exists.
Input Specification: The only input line contains an integer n.
Output Specification: Print a beautiful permutation of integers 1,2,\ldots,n. If there are several solutions, you may print any of them. If there are no solutions, print "NO SOLUTION".
